::Spears::

She liked how his soft fur felt as she ran her hand through it.
"You know, when the fighting is over with, what do you think you'll 
do? I mean, all we do is fight.  But did you ever wonder what you'd 
do with your time if you didn't have to fight?"
She looked down at Striker and smiled. Then she turned to see where 
she was walking.
"I can think of a few things to do besides killing killer chairs." 
she said with a grin. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker chuckles at Spears' comment. "Furniture gets boring after a 
few 
> chairs. Cabinets arn't too tough, though."
> 
> He looks around at the trees that they were walking by, 
instinctively 
> scanning the area for any Predacons.
